value.string:
from Products.ERP5Type.Document import newTempBase
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 request = container.REQUEST
 
 preferences = dict()
 if not box_relative_url:
 box_relative_url = request.get('box_relative_url', None)
 if box_relative_url:
 box = portal.restrictedTraverse(box_relative_url)
 preferences = box.KnowledgeBox_getDefaultPreferencesDict()
 
 mode = preferences.get('mode', 'cpu')
 
 
 data = {}
 
 
 for obj in portal.portal_catalog(portal_type='Computer Item'):
 if mode == 'operating_system':
 key = obj.ocs_operating_system
 data.setdefault(key, 0)
 data[key] = data[key] + 1
 elif mode == 'cpu':
 key = obj.ocs_cpu
 data.setdefault(key, 0)
 data[key] = data[key] + 1
 if mode == 'network':
 for key in obj.ocs_network_interface.split(','):
 data.setdefault(key, 0)
 data[key] = data[key] + 1
 
 
 return [
 newTempBase(portal, title, title=title, count=count)
 for title, count in data.items()
 ]
